name: G+ light
description: A little script that tries to resemble good old G+.
additional_info:
Changes to the main style:

  • Changes in whitespace usage. Reducing of some paddings, etc.
  • Notifications whitespace fix.
  • Comments scrollbars removed.
  • Primary background of posts, comments, etc is white.
  • Highlighting does not occurs on hover, links and names is always blue.
  • Removed blocks you know, you are invited to the community and indicate the date of birth.
  • Some useless tiresome blocks ("You might like", "Communities invitation", etc) removed.
Source on gist.github.com Rev 10 Google+ broke again. Crutch was updated due to it. Style was updated to support new google tree. All broken stuff, like notifications was fixed. Fixes since last version:
  • Images centring
  • Albums (still a mess now, but usable)
